Spooky Scary Skelepoops.dialogueText: You deserve Gems! And one two three four and one two three four! Go dab on those bone poops! They only come 'round once per day unlike my hips!
Spooky Scary Skelepoops.name: Spooky Scary Skelepoops

Waitin' for the Cards to Drop.dialogueText: Remember those Boops take 24 hours to respawn. Pop shove it boo yah!!! While you're grinding for their card why not gather me some bones?
Waitin' for the Cards to Drop.name: Waitin' for the Cards to Drop
Waitin' for the Cards to Drop.questText: Collect Bonemeal for Meel! This will take a while...

Dialogue.text: Doot doot!
Oh yeaaa!! Oh yeaaa!!! Work it woooo!!!
Hey gamer! Ooo yea rattle them ribs!!! You found a secret! Mmm yea to the left to the right! That's friggin Epic!
You deserve Gems! And one two three four and one two three four! Go dab on those bone poops! They only come 'round once per day unlike my hips! @ QUEST:Defeat the Boops!
You're packs full! Work them bones yea! I can't give you your gems!
Niiiice! Shake-a shake-a! Take these gems you disembowler! Aww yea pivot them funnybones!!
Remember those Boops take 24 hours to respawn. Pop shove it boo yah!!! While you're grinding for their card why not gather me some bones? @ QUEST:Collect Bonemeal for Meel! This will take a while...
Dialogue.associated: Waitin' for the Cards to Drop

Dialogue.text: Oh hey gamer! Ooo yea!!! You found a secret! Mmm yea to the left to the right!
Oh hey gamer! Ooo yea!!! You found a secret! Mmm yea to the left to the right!
Games! Fun! Prizes! Come play why dont ya!
Well not yet actually. I'll be coded up before launch though!

Lookin' Like a Snack.dialogueText: Ssssssurprise! I wasss lying I am indeed going to give you a quesssst! But I ssstill indend to eat you alive sssso get me some teeth!
Lookin' Like a Snack.name: Lookin' Like a Snack
Lookin' Like a Snack.questText: Get some teeth so you can be eaten! Mmm yummy!

Red Stuff Bad!.dialogueText: Ssssso heres the thing... I can't actually bite you because your blood would violate this game's E-10 rating. Get me sssome red liquid so we can pretend I'm eating you!
Red Stuff Bad!.name: Red Stuff Bad!
Red Stuff Bad!.questText: BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GODS!!! Err... I mean get HP pots!

PSA. You Are Being Eaten!.dialogueText: Now come over here or no one will believe that it was me who brought you to your end!
PSA. You Are Being Eaten!.name: PSA. You Are Being Eaten!
PSA. You Are Being Eaten!.questText: Wait why do they want to pretend to have eaten you again? Uh oh I don't like the look of that Quest Helper...

A Noob, served Medium Rare!.dialogueText: Go get me ssssomeone else to eat and make ssssure they're a total noob ssso I can ssswallow them whole!
A Noob, served Medium Rare!.name: A Noob, served Medium Rare!
A Noob, served Medium Rare!.questText: Lure another player to Snakejar's platform and have them say 'Im a total noob'.

Dialogue.text: SSSSSSSssss....
...ssssssup....
...pperrr isss trying to talk to me. Come clossser so that I may eat you alive. I definitely won't give you a quesssst or anything.
Ssssssurprise! I wasss lying I am indeed going to give you a quesssst! But I ssstill indend to eat you alive sssso get me some teeth! @ QUEST: Get some teeth so you can be eaten! Mmm yummy!
You have no sssspace! Please clear 2 spaces for these itemssss.
Ssssuch wonderful teeth but turnssss out I already have teeth with which to eat you! My misssstake sssssss!

Ssssso heres the thing... I can't actually bite you because your blood would violate this game's E-10 rating. Get me sssome red liquid so we can pretend I'm eating you! @ QUEST: BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GODS!!! Err... I mean get HP pots!
You have no sssspace! Please clear 2 spaces for these itemssss.
Fantassstic! I'll soak the teeth in this liquid ssssso that it will appear to all that I've taken a bite out of you when I pretend to.

Now come over here or no one will believe that it was me who brought you to your end! @ QUEST: Wait why do they want to pretend to have eaten you again? Uh oh I don't like the look of that Quest Helper...
You have no sssspace! Please clear 3 spaces for these itemssss.
Hmm I ssssuppose I'll have to asssk the next player I see to prepare themsssselves medium rare... your sssspecies is a bit tough for my tassstes.
... ... ... ... that'sssss enough waiting where are the other playerssss??
Go get me ssssomeone else to eat and make ssssure they're a total noob ssso I can ssswallow them whole! @ QUEST:Lure another player to Snakejar's platform and have them say 'Im a total noob'.
You have no sssspace! Please clear 3 spaces for these itemssss.
MMMMmmmm what a juicy noob that was! The dumb ones are alwayssss the most ssssucculent!

Rhyming is Key!.dialogueText: Moonmen steal key they're meant for me! Get them back rare as they may be!
Rhyming is Key!.name: Rhyming is Key!
Rhyming is Key!.questText: Kill moonmen until they drop all the keys you need.

Uh, Something About Vials?.dialogueText: But no you have forgot! Those vials are vital are they not? With no other spot in the plot they deserve a shot!
Uh, Something About Vials?.name: Uh, Something About Vials?
Uh, Something About Vials?.questText: Upgrade 13 Vials up to light-blue rarity or higher
Uh, Something About Vials?.notes: See [[King Doot]] for details on summoning this secret boss.

Journey to the Center of the Blundermine.dialogueText: So go go go what do you wait for? There's no more in store up here anymore go explore the world's core!
Journey to the Center of the Blundermine.name: Journey to the Center of the Blundermines
Journey to the Center of the Blundermine.questText: Reach the Ol' Straightaway mining area with Plat and Dementia ore.

The Mummy of Mystery.dialogueText: It must be found out. My status as the most secret is in doubt... a status I cannot live without!
The Mummy of Mystery.name: The Mummy of Mystery
The Mummy of Mystery.questText: Find the biggest secret in all of YumYum Desert and defeat it.

Dialogue.text: Ooowee such a spooky place this be!
Rope go up but where it go? Then rope over there but how? No one know!
I like mystery this place for me! But in need of help this pyramid be!
Moonmen steal key they're meant for me! Get them back rare as they may be! @ QUEST:Kill moonmen until they drop all the keys you need.
You have full inventory is this end of story?
I like keys they open doors! Many many doors some below floors!
But no you have forgot! Those vials are vital are they not? With no other spot in the plot they deserve a shot! @ QUEST:Upgrade 13 Vials up to light-blue rarity or higher
You have full inventory is this end of your story?
The deed done hope you had fun! But you must run free and leave me be where the sun I cannot see!
My head keeps spinning around and around. It won't stop until you go underground never to be found!
So go go go what do you wait for? There's no more in store up here anymore go explore the world's core! @ QUEST:Reach the Ol' Straightaway mining area with Plat and Dementia ore.
Dialogue.associated: Journey to the Center of the Blundermines

Dialogue.text: You have a full inventory is this end of the story?
Oowee I've got more to say just not today! @ Return at Lv. 70
While you were gone I had a vision so strong... and realized I had it all wrong!
There is a secret portal with a secret key! Unseen by any mere mortal it eluded even me!
It must be found out. My status as the most secret is in doubt... a status I cannot live without! @ QUEST:Find the biggest secret in all of YumYum Desert and defeat it.
You have full inventory is this end of your story?
Vanquished at last boy that was fast! That iconoclast mummy has passed I forecast that my status will now go unsurpassed! Thank you player this was really great... an absolute blast!

Platforms in Disguise, Platsformers!.dialogueText: Next to the 1st mark I see frogs the 2nd mark I believe is located in a Doctors office and the 3rd is somewhere between the Grandioso Canyon and here.
Platforms in Disguise, Platsformers!.name: Platforms in Disguise, Platsformers!
Platforms in Disguise, Platsformers!.questText: Find the 3 invisible platforms hidden throughout the game.

Findin' Fingerprints.dialogueText: You see I seek the whereabouts of the Maestro Blobulyte... it's a Journeyman thing. Anywho I am about ready to Job Advance and I am certain Lavaflame2 put in a secret subclass NPC somewhere!
Findin' Fingerprints.name: Findin' Fingerprints
Findin' Fingerprints.questText: Collect materials maybe the blobulyte left some fingerprints on one?

You Can't Run, but you Can Hide.dialogueText: A quick search on the Wiki revealed that the Blobulyte is hiding behind the only flowering cactus in the game. Beyond that I'm stumped...
You Can't Run, but you Can Hide.name: You Can't Run, but you Can Hide
You Can't Run, but you Can Hide.questText: Give up on your search for the Maestro Blobulyte by saying 'Darn you Blobulyte! Why must you hide like a coward'
You Can't Run, but you Can Hide.notes: It has to be typed exactly like Wellington says, cAsE sEnSiTiVe. If you're not using a US Keyboard layout, Shift+1 is how you must type the exclamation point. Requires level 70.

Puzzles and Math, a Winning Combination!.name: Puzzles and Math, a Winning Combination!
Puzzles and Math, a Winning Combination!.questText: @ Square the number of letters in your character's name. For example 'Koala2' would be 6x6=  36. Kill sand giants until there are exactly 'that' many items on the ground and talk to me! If you get it wrong I'll remove ALL items in the map! @ QUEST
Puzzles and Math, a Winning Combination!.notes: Number of drop, not the total quantity of item. Coins also count. Spaces do NOT count.

Dialogue.text: Greetings my good man.
I am Sir Wellington Snoutsworth... yes THAT Sir Wellington Snoutsworth! Famed explorer world renouned adventurer owner of the infinite paged map!
As it happens I was just browsing page 6 infinity 7 of my map here... and I noticed some strange markings I could have sworn weren't there before!

Next to the 1st mark I see frogs the 2nd mark I believe is located in a Doctors office and the 3rd is somewhere between the Grandioso Canyon and here. @ QUEST:Find the 3 invisible platforms hidden throughout the game.
Please my good man show some respect! My prizes for completing the quest are well worth keeping you are very mistaken to not have 2 open inventory spaces!
My my so these marks were indeed phased in from an alternate universe? Perhaps a higher order world will shed light on their existence but whatever they may be they haven't much to do with me.

You see I seek the whereabouts of the Maestro Blobulyte... it's a Journeyman thing. Anywho I am about ready to Job Advance and I am certain Lavaflame2 put in a secret subclass NPC somewhere! @ QUEST:Collect materials maybe the blobulyte left some fingerprints on one?
Please my good man show some respect! My prizes for completing the quest are well worth keeping you are very mistaken to not have 3 open inventory spaces!

Good finds old sport! Now then lets see... @ Well quite frankly there isn't so much as a trace of Blob on any of these! Wherever that Blobulyte is they haven't been around these three monsters in a long time...
Well we've got ourselves a game of hide and seek! Why don't you come back later once I've found them? @ Return at Class Lv.70

A quick search on the Wiki revealed that the Blobulyte is hiding behind the only flowering cactus in the game. Beyond that I'm stumped... @ QUEST:Give up on your search for the Maestro Blobulyte by saying 'Darn you Blobulyte! Why must you hide like a coward'
Dialogue.associated: You Can't Run, but you Can Hide

Dialogue.text: Please my good man show some respect! My prizes for completing the quest are well worth keeping you are very mistaken to not have 2 open inventory spaces!

Hahaha! I concur old sport! However we mustn't get too down. As a matter of fact I take my hat off to the darn thing it's hiding skills are exquisite! I so suppose I'll be staying a lowly Journeyman for now.
One day... one day I'll find them! I dare say old sport they can't hide forever! After all sooner or later someone will update the Wiki with a full walkthrough on how to find them!
... but I think we've done our part lets change course here. How about a simple maths puzzle? Get our minds off of that devious blobulyte what do you think?

Right-o! Here's the puzzle: @ Square the number of letters in your character's name. For example 'Koala2' would be 6x6=  36. Kill sand giants until there are exactly 'that' many items on the ground and talk to me! If you get it wrong I'll remove ALL items in the map! @ QUEST:Do the puzzle!
Dialogue.associated: Puzzles and Math, a Winning Combination!

Dialogue.text: Please my good man show some respect! My prizes for completing the quest are well worth keeping you are very mistaken to not have 3 open inventory spaces!
Top stuff my man! Brilliantly solved! I must be getting back to my adventure now as you to yours... cheerio!

Dressing like a Dork.dialogueText: I need some fibres from the forest petals from Baba Yaga aaand... oh right a tiny little stupid pea brain to really tie it all together hahaha!
Dressing like a Dork.name: Dressing like a Dork
Dressing like a Dork.questText: Help Dazey build a Sprout costume. You don't actually need a pea brain that was just her being a jerk.
Dressing like a Dork.notes: After completing this quest, Dazey will be replaced by Sprout.

Literally Physics.dialogueText: So if you put the other materials on top of the two balls and drop everything the materials will bounce up to me!!!
Literally Physics.name: Literally Physics
Literally Physics.questText: Get some woodular circles from branches and do something with them? I don't go to Dazey's school either I'm as confused as you are.

Dialogue.text: Well look who decided to show up... no like really. Who are you? I've never seen you before.

And why do people like you always keep bugging me on my days off? If I wanted company I wouldn't be all the way up here would I! But no whenever I want some time to myself another one of you humans shows up looking for something to do!

You know what? Here's something to do... go make me a costume so that I look like that little twerp Sprout that way when people DO make it here I'll pretend to be them and since they've done their quests already they won't bother me!!

I need some fibres from the forest petals from Baba Yaga aaand... oh right a tiny little stupid pea brain to really tie it all together hahaha! @ QUEST:Help Dazey build a Sprout costume. You don't actually need a pea brain that was just her being a jerk.

Clear up 2 inventory spaces... like cmon seriously how do you keep forgetting this? I'm like the 12th NPC youve run into probably I swear you gamers never lear... @ 'Dazey continues to blow your tiny mistake out of proportion for a while longer'
Haha no way you seriously just did all that even though your codex showed I'd only give you 1 gem??? What a joke... anyway hand me the stuff.
... well? Why are you just standing there?
Wait you CAN'T manually jump?? WHAT??? But you have LEGS! I mean it makes sense that I can't but like I LITERALLY just saw you jumping on those other platforms... jeez this world sucks.

Ok new plan. Get two balls... no not THOSE balls you doorknob like actual circular balls. I remember this from class the other week. @ If you hold one ball right above the other and drop them both the top ball bounces BIG TIME!

So if you put the other materials on top of the two balls and drop everything the materials will bounce up to me!!! @ QUEST:Get some woodular circles from branches and do something with them? I don't go to Dazey's school either I'm as confused as you are.

Clear up 2 inventory spaces... like cmon seriously how do you keep forgetting this? I'm like the 12th NPC youve run into probably I swear you gamers never lear... @ 'Dazey continues to blow your tiny mistake out of proportion for a while longer'

NICE! FINALLY!!! Now I can make my costume and pretend to be Sprout! No one will ever bother me again!! Just gotta take this off and... @ Hey can I get some privacy you creep? Please leave the map and come back...

The Grind Begins...?.dialogueText: That is unless yer willin' to prove yerself. Go on show me whatcha can do!
The Grind Begins...?.name: The Grind Begins...?
The Grind Begins...?.notes: After 10 active kills, the quest auto-completes.

The Hatless Howerhouse!.dialogueText: Hows about we getcha a real challenge somethin' yall grasslickers over in them thar Blunderhills aint never done before...
The Hatless Howerhouse!.name: The Hatless Howerhouse!
The Hatless Howerhouse!.questText: Kill 20 Sandy Pots without your precious hat equipped.
The Hatless Howerhouse!.notes: Bubbles unlocked before you start this quest count, but the [[Distilled Water]] must be purchased while the quest is active.

No Country for One Character.dialogueText: Uh... er.. well tell ya what it's actually TOO big fer the two of us. Go get some more of them characters would ya?
No Country for One Character.name: No Country for One Character
No Country for One Character.questText: Create at least 3 new players for your Account.
No Country for One Character.notes: Vials unlocked before you start the quest count. See [[Alchemy#Vials|Alchemy Vials]] for a full list of unlockable Vials.

Say Goodbye to your Dubloon!.dialogueText: ... so ya can't talk but don't yall worry yerself cause I sure know one thing that talks round 'ere
Say Goodbye to your Dubloon!.name: Say Goodbye to your Dubloon!
Say Goodbye to your Dubloon!.questText: cold hard cash! Bring me round sum' that and we can git into some real business. @ QUEST
Say Goodbye to your Dubloon!.notes: The criminal is located through the portal below Mimics.

Alchemial Apprentice.dialogueText: ... you get all that pardner? Ya better 'ave cause I'm boutta test ya! Go unlock a bubble and buy some pure water from the Liquid Shop!
Alchemial Apprentice.name: Alchemial Apprentice
Alchemial Apprentice.notes: You have to complete [[Bandit Bob|Bandit Bob's]] questline for this.

Three Vials? Those are Rookie Numbers!.dialogueText: You can unlock vials by dropping specific resources at the cauldron in person. Not all resources have their own vial so ya gotta try 'em all!
Three Vials? Those are Rookie Numbers!.name: Three Vials? Those are Rookie Numbers!
Three Vials? Those are Rookie Numbers!.questText: Unlock 2 Vials. Stand infront of the Cauldron then drag an item like Copper out of your inventory
Three Vials? Those are Rookie Numbers!.notes: You have to complete [[Goldric|Goldric's]] questline for this.

The Notorious B.O.B.dialogueText: Me bein' an immobile cactus I'm still stuck tryna catch the first criminal. He goes by Notorious B.O.B but ya best believe that aint his real name. He should be 'round here somewhere...
The Notorious B.O.B.name: The Notorious B.O.B

Bake Him Away, Toys.dialogueText: Now then just get him to sign this Arrest Warrant and we'll have his bounty as easy as ya can say 'Easy' which is gosh darn easy I tell ya hwat!
Bake Him Away, Toys.name: Bake Him Away, Toys
Bake Him Away, Toys.notes: [[Carpetiem]] (in the [[Mashed Potato]] area) is the geezer you must help.

A Hat in Crime.dialogueText: Before we get startin' our crime spree we gotta look the part. Go get some materials from the Anvil so I can make ya a hat like mine.
A Hat in Crime.name: A Hat in Crime
A Hat in Crime.questText: Yes Bandit Bob set you up. Guess you're taking orders from a cactus now!

Commence Criminal Crimes!.dialogueText: Let's start by finding some'n in the Desert to crime on! And not that big bag guy he looks kinda tough... we'll get 'im another day.
Commence Criminal Crimes!.name: Commence Criminal Crimes!
Commence Criminal Crimes!.questText: Commit a crime on whoever the quest helper says to lol
Commence Criminal Crimes!.notes: All the required recipes are given at the start of this quest.

The Worst Trade Deal in History.dialogueText: That there stall owner heard he's got a bit of a money sitiation. Hows about yall help him with that?
The Worst Trade Deal in History.name: The Worst Trade Deal in History
The Worst Trade Deal in History.questText: Buy and sell a total of 10 Golden Dubloons.

Children? What'd they ever do for Me....dialogueText: I feel like we best do somethin' good for someone who won't make fun of us. Also remind me to steal that money back once we 'ventually go back to bein' evil.
Children? What'd they ever do for Me....name: Children? What'd they ever do for Me...
Children? What'd they ever do for Me....questText: Donate to the Starving Orphan Monsters foundation in the Cauldron.

Oh No, not the Elderly!.dialogueText: Supposin' you aint really innerested in that last part there's only one thing left to save our souls.
Oh No, not the Elderly!.name: Oh No, not the Elderly!
Oh No, not the Elderly!.questText: Find some old coot to assist. Some old rag a real carpet of a fella you know what I mean.

Tomb Raid.dialogueText: I got me an idea... there's a tomb way out in them Twilighty Desert dunes. It's home to the old Sultan a big dang elephant called Efaunt. You know what to do.
Tomb Raid.name: Tomb Raid
Tomb Raid.questText: Raid Efaunt's tomb and steal his crystal.

The New Sheriff.dialogueText: Go make the 3 Yumyum Desert Tokens of Completion and you can have my Yumyum Sherrif Trophy! Here's the token recipes.
The New Sheriff.name: The New Sheriff

Dialogue.text: Yall best be turnin' yourself right round I tell you hwat. Folks in these parts don't take kindly to outsiders like yorself.
That is unless yer willin' to prove yerself. Go on show me whatcha can do! @ QUEST:Kill 99999 Sandy Pots
You need more 1 open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
Woah there pardner it don't count if the darn game creator himself does it for ya! that them's cheatin' that is!
Hows about we getcha a real challenge somethin' yall grasslickers over in them thar Blunderhills aint never done before... @ QUEST:Kill 20 Sandy Pots without your precious hat equipped.
You need 1 more open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
Well alrighty! Mighty fine fightin' there pardner suppose you outsiders aint so bad! But you still best get on out this town aint big 'nuff fer the two of us!
Uh... er.. well tell ya what it's actually TOO big fer the two of us. Go get some more of them characters would ya? @ QUEST:Create at least 3 new players for your Account.
You need more 1 open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
That's more like it startin' to really look like one of them epic gamers ya hear about in the saloon! You sure can walk the walk but can ya talk the talk...?
...? @ Well comeon now then I asked ya a question! Can ya talk the talk?

... so ya can't talk but don't yall worry yerself cause I sure know one thing that talks round 'ere:cold hard cash! Bring me round sum' that and we can git into some real business. @ QUEST:Buy a Gold Dubloon to prove your worth.
You need more 2 open inventory spaces for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
Sure is pretty tell ya hwat! Lemme just... hold onto it for ya make sure it's real 'n all that.
Moving on then them monsters gonna whoop yo behind if ya don't use that there Alchemy Cauldron mabobber.
Listen up and I'll tell ya how it works: @ You assign characters to different cauldrons to power them. There are Bubble Cauldrons on the 1st page and Liquid Cauldrons on the 2nd page.
BUBBLE CAULDRONS slowly unlock new bonus bubbles. The small ones are passive and will give their bonus to all your characters all the time. The bigger ones must be equipped.
LIQUID CAULDRONS give you different waters to spend on shop items. You can only hold so many liquids so make sure to use them when you can.
... you get all that pardner? Ya better 'ave cause I'm boutta test ya! Go unlock a bubble and buy some pure water from the Liquid Shop!
You need more 2 open inventory spaces for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
Yall got yerself some smarts up in that head of yours yell you hwat! That was some techincal stuff ya just figured out! @ Let's cover one last thing before we start bustin' crime.

You can unlock vials by dropping specific resources at the cauldron in person. Not all resources have their own vial so ya gotta try 'em all! @ QUEST:Unlock 2 Vials. Stand infront of the Cauldron then drag an item like Copper out of your inventory
Dialogue.associated: Three Vials? Those are Rookie Numbers!

Dialogue.text: Kiss that tutorial goodbye yeeeeHAW! @ Lets get to some real cowboy bid'ness! There's a list of Wanted Criminals wanderin' all about Yum Yum Desert and each of 'ems got a big ol' EXP bounty on their head.

Me bein' an immobile cactus I'm still stuck tryna catch the first criminal. He goes by Notorious B.O.B but ya best believe that aint his real name. He should be 'round here somewhere... @ QUEST:Find the criminal!
You need more 2 open inventory spaces for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
You found the bugger? That's some right good sleuthing you're a natural!
Now then just get him to sign this Arrest Warrant and we'll have his bounty as easy as ya can say 'Easy' which is gosh darn easy I tell ya hwat!
You need more 1 open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
Well tip me sideways and call me the leanin' cactus of Pisa ya got him! Now then lets just take a look at this here signature...
Yep signature sure looks real... REALLY LIKE YOURS! Ya thought you were so smart hidin' all these years but I finally caught ya red handed!
Yessir this signature right here is EXACTLY the same one I saw you sign all those Post Office orders with so there ain't no doubt that you're the real Bandit Bob!
This is a mighty fine turn of events aint it just! @ Tell you hwat forget catching criminals... I'm gonna BECOME the criminal! And YOUR gonna help me unless yer fixin' to get turned in!

Before we get startin' our crime spree we gotta look the part. Go get some materials from the Anvil so I can make ya a hat like mine. @ QUEST:Yes Bandit Bob set you up. Guess you're taking orders from a cactus now!
You need more 2 open inventory spaces for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
With this hat we are now the LOVERS OF AMORIA!
... no hang on that's my idea for when we end up joining The Bachelor. Until then we are actually called THE HATS OF CRIME!
In a few quests we gon' be known throughout Idleon as the greatest criminals to ever walk the earth! ...and stay still on the earth since I cant move!
Let's start by finding some'n in the Desert to crime on! And not that big bag guy he looks kinda tough... we'll get 'im another day. @ QUEST:Commit a crime on whoever the quest helper says to lol
You need more 1 open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
Howdy pardner how'd it go down? You get sum cold hard cash? Maybe some jewels?
You stole... hwat? YOU STOLE HWAT?? Have you no SHAME? My lord and there's still some peanuts left!!!
Yall just had to go and take it an 11 when I was just lookin' for a 6 maybe 7 tops. Look yall should've told me you were had no moral compass I'dve never made you my partner!
But it's too late for that. Only way to turn this 'round is to change our ways and do some good deeds.
That there stall owner heard he's got a bit of a money sitiation. Hows about yall help him with that? @ QUEST:Buy and sell a total of 10 Golden Dubloons.
Dialogue.associated: The Worst Trade Deal in History

Dialogue.text: You need more 1 open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
Well I'd say that worked! 'cept as soon as ya turned around to come talk to me the shopkeep started pointin' an' laughin' at ya...

I feel like we best do somethin' good for someone who won't make fun of us. Also remind me to steal that money back once we 'ventually go back to bein' evil. @ QUEST:Donate to the Starving Orphan Monsters foundation in the Cauldron.
Dialogue.associated: Children? What'd they ever do for Me...

Dialogue.text: You need more 1 open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!

That was a bit better tell you hwat... but you know what they say: @ Give an orphan monster some water and they'll drink for a day. Teach an orphan monster how to extract the liquid from the players they kill and they'll drink for a lifetime.

Supposin' you aint really innerested in that last part there's only one thing left to save our souls. @ We gotta help the elderly... @ QUEST:Find some old coot to assist. Some old rag a real carpet of a fella you know what I mean.
You need more 1 open inventory space for rewards! Clear some space and talk to me again!
That'll just about do it! @ Wait... did you say the old geezer's name was... Carpetiem?? @ No no no no!! He's the oldest most crankiest old person! Helping him is like helping 100 old people!
Ya went too far! Now were TOO good! I swore on me grandcacti's life I'd never end up a goody two shoes... We gotta go back to crime to balance this out!

I got me an idea... there's a tomb way out in them Twilighty Desert dunes. It's home to the old Sultan a big dang elephant called Efaunt. You know what to do. @ QUEST:Raid Efaunt's tomb and steal his crystal.
